args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: High Voltage Failure Can Cause Loss of Drive Power

PACCAR Incorporated (PACCAR) is recalling certain 2021-2025 Peterbilt 520, 579, and Kenworth T680 trucks.  The high voltage (HV) contactors may open, causing a sudden loss of high voltage and a loss of drive power.A loss of drive power increases the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 239.0"
